title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo, specifically in the field labeled 'Host:'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch the application
2. Locate the first Combo labeled 'Host:'
3. Click on the Combo

Expected Result:
- The focus caret should be in the first Combo 'Host:'.

Actual Result:
- The focus is not set to the first Combo upon clicking it.
